discription: Tokyo is the capital of Japan and one of the most populous cities in the world. It’s located at the head of Tokyo Bay on the Pacific coast of central Honshu, which is Japan’s largest island

example.japanese: 私は来週、東京に旅行に行きます。
example.english: I am going to travel to Tokyo next week.

discription: A student is a person who is studying at a school, college, or university. They can also be someone who is learning anything, at any stage in their life

A teacher is a professional who teaches students based on national curriculum guidelines within their specialist subject areas. Their duties include assigning homework, grading tests, documenting progress, and keeping up with parent communication
A friend is a person attached to another by feelings of affection or personal regard. They can provide assistance, support, and companionship

A family is a group of people related by the ties of marriage, blood, or adoption. Members of a family usually live in a single household and interact with each other in their respective social positions, usually those of spouses, parents, children, and siblings
